text: There was a fig tree by the side of a road, and a fox saw a sleeping snake beside it. Envying that body so long, and thinking that it could match it, the fox fell to the ground next to the snake and tried to stretch herself as much as she could. He made so much effort that he finally, vanity-wise, broke down. Don't imitate the older ones if you're not yet qualified to do so.
title: La zorra y la serpiente
author: nan Esopo
